question: Who of the following launches the mobile therapy vans to elderly people recently?
explanation: Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar flagged off mobile therapy vans which would provide basic medical assistance to elderly people, widows and other section who requires social security. The CM flagged off mobile therapy vans to launch "Buniyadi Sanjivani Sewa". A total of 11 vans were send on the occasion to as many districts. The vans equipped with basic medical apparatus and accompanied by technical team would provide basic medical care to elderly people, widows and disabled in the districts.
